definitions.definition: An incidental remark to a person next to one made discreetly but not in private, audible only to that person.
A brief comment by a character addressing the audience , unheard by other characters.
A minor related mention, an afterthought .

main_definition: An incidental remark to a person next to one made discreetly but not in private, audible only to that person.
secondary_definitions: ( theater ) A brief comment by a character addressing the audience , unheard by other characters.
A minor related mention, an afterthought .
